ack.p: We thank Drs. A. Reznicek and R. Rabeler and the University of Michigan Herbarium (MICH), Drs. M. Donoghue and P. Sweeney and the Yale Peabody Museum (Y), Dr. T. Lumbsch and C. Niezgoda and the Chicago Field Museum (F), M. J. Bian and the Shanghai Botanical Garden (SG), and Dr. A. Fryday and the Michigan State Herbarium (MSC). We would additionally like to thank S. Fernandes at the University of Michiganâ€™s School for Environment and Sustainability (UM-SEAS), and R. Dzombak, A. Hamersma and M. Ng in the Department of Earth and Environmental Sciences at the University of Michigan (UM-EES) for the assistance obtaining historical and present-day collections.
